sentences.text: PROPOSAL NO. 3 APPROVAL, ON AN ADVISORY BASIS, OF EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSALNO.3
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPROVAL,ONANADVISORYBASIS,OFEXECUTIVECOMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the requirements of Section 14A of the Exchange Act and the related rules of the SEC, stockholders are entitled to cast a nonbinding, advisory vote to approve the compensation of our NEOs (often referred to as say on pay).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our current policy is to provide stockholders with an opportunity to participate in this advisory vote on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, you are being asked to vote on the following resolution at the Annual Meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the stockholders APPROVE, on an advisory basis, the compensation paid to the NEOs, as disclosed in this proxy statement, which includes the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the accompanying tables and the related narrative disclosure, pursuant to the SECs executive compensation disclosure rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recommends that you vote FOR this resolution because it believes that our executive compensation program supports our compensation objectives and philosophies, including:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Aligning compensation with stockholder interests;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Promoting the creation of long-term stockholder value;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Providing a straightforward and transparent compensation program, with rigorous, objective and at-risk performance criteria, including future relative TSR as a significant component;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discouraging excessive risk-taking by balancing short- and long-term compensation awards;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attracting, motivating and retaining key employees with outstanding talent and ability; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rewarding performance, with a meaningful portion of compensation tied to the Companys financial and strategic goals
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING STANDARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal to approve the compensation paid to our NEOs requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast on the proposal at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal is advisory only and will not be binding on, overrule any decision by, or create or imply additional fiduciary duties for, HCP, our Board or the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee, which is responsible for designing and administering our executive compensation program, values the opinions expressed by stockholders in their vote on this proposal and will consider the outcome of the vote when making future compensation decisions for NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our current policy is to provide our stockholders with an opportunity to approve the compensation of our NEOs each year at the annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is expected that the next advisory vote on executive compensation will be held at the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OUR BOARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: unanimously recommends that you vote FOR the approval of the compensation of our NEOs, as disclosed in this proxy statement, which includes the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the accompanying tables and the related narrative disclosure, pursuant to the SECs executive compensation disclosure rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL NO.4: APPROVAL, ON AN ADVISORY BASIS, OF THE FREQUENCY OF FUTURE ADVISORY VOTES ON EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSALNO.4
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPROVAL,ONANADVISORYBASIS,OFTHEFREQUENCYOFFUTUREADVISORYVOTESONEXECUTIVE COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proposal No. 4 affords stockholders the opportunity to cast an advisory vote on how often an advisory vote on executive compensation should be included in our proxy materials for future annual stockholder meetings (or a special stockholder meeting for which we must include executive compensation information in the proxy statement for that meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this Proposal No. 4, stockholders may vote to have the advisory vote on executive compensation every year, every two years or every three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required under SEC rules, we are required to submit this frequency vote to stockholders every six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2011, our Board has provided stockholders with an opportunity to vote on executive compensation at every annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board continues to believe that advisory votes on executive compensation should be conducted every year so that stockholders may annually express their views on our executive compensation program, which feedback the Compensation Committee considers in structuring the annual compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not have a preference regarding the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation, you should abstain from voting on the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTING STANDARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation requires the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast on the proposal at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no frequency option receives the affirmative vote of a majority of the votes cast at the Annual Meeting, the Board will consider the option receiving the highest number of votes as the preferred option of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal is advisory only and will not be binding on, overrule any decision by, or create or imply additional fiduciary duties for, HCP, our Board or the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee, which is responsible for designing and administering our executive compensation program, values the opinions expressed by stockholders in their vote on this proposal and will consider the outcome of the vote when making future decisions regarding the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notwithstanding the Boards recommendation and the outcome of the stockholder vote, the Board may decide to conduct future advisory votes on executive compensation on a more or less frequent basis and may vary its practice based on factors such as discussions with stockholders and the adoption of material changes to our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OUR BOARD
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: unanimously recommends that you vote to hold future advisory votes on executive compensation every 1 year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSALS TO BE INCLUDED IN 2018 PROXY MATERIALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder that desires to have a proposal considered for presentation at the 2018 annual meeting of stockholders, and included in HCPs proxy materials used in connection with our 2018 annual meeting, must submit the proposal in writing to our Corporate Secretary so that it is received no later than November 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proposal must also comply with the requirements of Rule 14a-8 under the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY ACCESS NOMINATIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any stockholder (or group of no more than 25 stockholders) meeting the Companys continuous ownership requirements set forth in our Bylaws that wishes to nominate candidates for election to our Board for inclusion in our proxy materials for our 2018 annual meeting of stockholders must provide written notice to our Corporate Secretary no earlier than October 17, 2017, nor later than November 16, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other specifics regarding the foregoing proxy access right, including the required content of the notice and certain other eligibility and procedural requirements, can be found in Section 8 of Article II of our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOMINATIONS OR PROPOSALS NOT INCLUDED IN 2018 PROXY MATERIALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a stockholder seeks to nominate a candidate for election or to propose business for consideration at our 2018 annual meeting but not have it included in our proxy materials for the 2018 annual meeting, we must receive notice of the proposal or director nomination no earlier than January 27, 2018 and no later than February 26, 2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we change the date of our 2018 annual meeting to a date that is before March 28, 2018 or after June 26, 2018, however, notice of any proposal or director nomination must instead be delivered not earlier than the ninetieth (90th) day and not later than the close of business on the later of the sixtieth (60th) day prior to our 2018 annual meeting, or the tenth (10th) day following the day on which we publicly announce the date of our 2018 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the notice is not received between these dates or does not satisfy the additional notice requirements set forth in Article II, Section 7(a) of our Bylaws, the notice will be considered untimely and will not be acted upon at our 2018 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals, nominations and notices should be directed to the attention of the Corporate Secretary, HCP, Inc., 1920 Main Street, Suite 1200, Irvine, California 92614.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may also recommend director candidates for the Boards consideration by following the procedures described under Board of Directors and Corporate GovernanceDirector Selection ProcessStockholder Recommendations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DELIVERYOFPROXYMATERIALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We may satisfy SEC rules regarding delivery of proxy materials, including our proxy statements and Annual Reports by delivering only one set of proxy material to multiple stockholders that share the same address, unless we have received contrary instructions in writing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This householding process can result in meaningful cost savings for us and is consistent with our commitment to sustainability by reducing the environmental impact of printing and mailing paper copies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon oral or written request, we will deliver promptly a separate copy of proxy materials to a stockholder at a shared address to which a single copy of the proxy materials was delivered.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered in your own name, you may request a separate copy of the proxy materials for this Annual Meeting or for future meetings of HCP stockholders by notifying Broadridge toll-free at 1-800-542-1061 or writing to Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc., 51 Mercedes Way, Edgewood NY, 11717.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a street name holder, please contact the broker, bank or other nominee that holds your shares to request a separate copy of proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the future, stockholders of record can avoid receiving duplicate mailings by following the instructions on the Internet at www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name and you would like to receive only one copy of the proxy materials in the future, you should contact your bank, broker or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon the written request of any person solicited hereby, we will provide a copy of our Annual Report to such person, without charge.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requests should be directed to our Corporate Secretary at HCP, Inc., 1920 Main Street, Suite 1200, Irvine, California 92614.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: VOTE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We urge you to submit your proxy or voting instructions as soon as possible, whether or not you expect to attend the Annual Meeting and vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you attend the Annual Meeting and vote in person, your proxy will not be used.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
